tweet_text: Phineas and Ferb would have made the vaccine by now.
I was a vaccine checker tonight at my venue, and I swear to God I'm not messing with you. One couple came up to me and asked, "Vaccine for what?" What do you mean, vaccine for what?
I asked the nurse who was giving me my vaccine if I could use a bandaid that I brought from home. She responded, "I don't see why not." However, now she understands why not.

When the polio vaccine was released in 1955, people lined up to get it, and we were only two years away from artificial satellites. Now, in 2021, we carry external world-brains in our pockets, and there are robots on Mars. Yet, there are still some individuals who believe that the COVID vaccine is filled with harmful substances.
I asked my mom if she felt any side effects from her second vaccine shot today, and she said she had an acute appreciation for science.
A 6-year old ballet student asked me today if I am excited about getting my "Fauci Ouchie" soon, and I will now be referring to the COVID-19 vaccine as only that because it is the cutest thing ever.
I am a nurse, and Lindsey Graham received a vaccine before I did.
Johnson and Johnson used their experience in making two-in-one shampoo and conditioner to design their vaccine.

As my 10-year-old received his Pfizer vaccine tonight, he was nervous but kept whispering his high-risk best friend's name repeatedly. And I have zero regrets that my kid was scared and yet did something out of love for another person anyways.
Dolly Parton did not tumble out of bed and stumble to the kitchen to pour herself a cup of ambition just for you to refuse to take the COVID vaccine that she helped fund.
Great, my horse has worms and the pharmacy is out of everything except COVID vaccines.

My aunt died of COVID last night. She wasn't sick for very long. She is a lawyer who was about to retire. She had all the vaccines. She was a warrior for saving women from domestic violence and a proud volunteer of the House of Ruth for years. Rest in peace, we lost a beautiful soul.

Had an extensive interaction with Bill Gates. We discussed issues ranging from India's efforts to fight Coronavirus, work of the Gates Foundation in battling COVID-19, role of technology, innovation, and producing a vaccine to cure the pandemic.

Pfizer Leak: Exposing the Pfizer Manufacturing and Supply Agreement. (thread) Background: Pfizer has been very aggressive in trying to protect the details of their international COVID-19 vaccine agreements. Luckily, I have managed to obtain one.
My cousin received the vaccine and three days later, WHAM! They stepped on a Lego. I'm not saying it's because of the vaccine, but it's worth doing your own research.

The mRNA vaccines from Pfizer and Moderna are brilliant at a scientific level. I have had a few people in my real life ask me to explain how it works, so I will try my best here in this thread while I am waiting for a patient to show.

So I am hearing many myths about COVID-19 and would like to quickly clear the record. Coronavirus will go away in summer months. Wrong. Previous pandemics did not follow weather patterns, and as we enter summer, there will be winter in the Southern Hemisphere. The virus is global.

Today, BTS returned to the United Nations General Assembly to share a powerful message on climate action, COVID-19 vaccines, and the importance of taking care of ourselves and our communities. Thank you, BTS, for inspiring a generation of young people. Together, we can create a better world.
If the vaccine was dangerous, they would have given it to poor people first, not politicians and billionaires.
Today, the FDA approved the first COVID-19 vaccine for the prevention of COVID-19 disease in individuals 16 years of age and older.
I work at a thrift store and found this vaccine card from 1956. Felt weirdly timely.

I just left the emergency room. We are officially experiencing a surge in COVID-19 cases. The Delta Variant is spreading rapidly and it is significantly more transmissible than the original virus. Ninety-nine percent of our intensive care unit admissions did not receive a vaccine. Almost all of them regret not getting vaccinated.

I received the COVID-19 vaccine today. My wing is feeling a little sore, but it will provide an extra protective boost for my body, keeping me and others healthy. Ms. Erica R. Hill even mentioned that I have been getting vaccines since I was a little bird. I had no idea!

Took my first dose of the COVID-19 vaccine at All India Institute of Medical Sciences. Remarkable how our doctors and scientists have worked in quick time to strengthen the global fight against COVID-19. I appeal to all those who are eligible to take the vaccine. Together, let us make India COVID-19 free!
The Omnicron variant is just another example of how COVID will be prolonged if rich nations and Big Pharma keep blocking vaccine distribution.
He is not lying, this is me before and after the vaccine. Not enough people are speaking up about this.

Oxford University was planning to open source its vaccine, but the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation intervened and persuaded them to sell exclusive rights to AstraZeneca. Currently, AstraZeneca is failing to deliver, causing difficulties for poor countries in accessing vaccines.

When I received the vaccine, the healthcare provider asked about my well-being. I responded by saying that I felt a bit unwell, and they decided to withdraw the syringe without administering the vaccine.
I am old enough to remember when vaccine passports were called immunization records and nobody was upset about that.

I will never understand how people decided masks and vaccines were the defining obstacle to American freedom and not, I don't know, the 40-hour work week, rent, college tuition, police, Ryan Seacrest, etc.

Story of a 66-year-old researcher, an immigrant, who rarely received grants, never had her own laboratory, and never earned more than $60,000. For four decades, she persevered in her work on messenger RNA (mRNA), a path considered foolish. Her work serves as the foundation for the Pfizer and Moderna vaccines.

Jin: We are all vaccinated and we sympathize with people who fear vaccines because it is something that did not exist before. But I believe that if we are afraid of the past, we will not be able to make progress. And President Moon's smile.
I need politicians to stop saying, "The Black community doesn't trust our vaccine" and start saying, "We have a history of medically abusing Black people, thus we violated their trust."
KFC had eleven secret herbs and spices, and nobody questioned it for years. But suddenly, you want to know what is in the Covid vaccine.
They said the vaccine stopped transmission. Now they are lying and saying they didn't. Video proof here.

As president, I will implement nationwide mask mandates, ensure access to regular, reliable, and free testing, and accelerate the development of treatments and vaccines. I won't waste any time getting this virus under control.
People may say, "I am not getting the vaccine, who knows what is in it," and then consume hot dogs.

People are worried about the vaccine being developed in nine months, but we should consider what else could be accomplished in such a short time if scientists didn't have to spend so much time seeking funding and support.

Alabama doctor says this about her Covid patients, some of whom are dying: “One of the last things they do before they’re intubated is beg me for the vaccine. I hold their hand and tell them that I’m sorry, but it’s too late.” https://t.co/WEgAhHW2hf

This is devastating news. Global South countries have been fighting for the right to manufacture and import affordable versions of the COVID vaccines. A few hours ago, the United States, United Kingdom, and European Union joined forces to block them at the World Trade Organization. The West is indefensible.

The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) now states that 94% of all coronavirus deaths were accompanied by other health conditions, indicating that the individuals had co-morbidities. Less than 10,000 Americans have died from Covid-19 alone. Coronavirus is and always has been a false claim. Democrats masked and impoverished America to manipulate an election.

Today's record-breaking vaccination numbers are gladdening. The vaccine remains our strongest weapon to fight COVID-19. Congratulations to those who got vaccinated and kudos to all the frontline warriors working hard to ensure so many citizens got the vaccine. Well done India!
Please stop saying that the vaccine does not have severe side effects. I took my shots, and now I am alive and have to keep working.

The notion that these vaccines emerged unexpectedly is a consequence of inadequate science communication, leading to devastating outcomes. They are the outcome of extensive research conducted over many years in various disciplines, capitalizing on the vast expanse and profound understanding of human knowledge. This is the essence of scientific progress, and it is truly remarkable.

Breaking News: The World Health Organization (WHO) has approved the first-ever malaria vaccine, which has the potential to save tens of thousands of children in sub-Saharan Africa. According to a WHO official, the search for this vaccine has been ongoing for a hundred years, making this a truly historic event.
The worst thing about getting the vaccine shot was when I had to take off my Blink 182 sweatshirt, and everyone saw that I was also wearing a Blink 182 t-shirt.

A death warrant for Texans. Add them to the 44,000+ individuals killed as he failed to confront the pandemic and botched the vaccine rollout. And those who froze to death because he cares more about energy companies' profits than keeping Texans alive. Abbott is killing the people of Texas.
"Vaccines are unnatural." Yeah, so are eyeglasses, air travel, surgical anesthesia, scuba diving, air conditioning, purified water, bullets, television, microwaves, and shoes.
Our latest investigation hears from a whistleblower engaged in Pfizer's pivotal COVID-19 vaccine trial. Her evidence raises serious questions about data integrity and regulatory oversight.

It would make every Indian proud that the two vaccines that have been given emergency use approval are made in India. This shows the eagerness of our scientific community to fulfill the dream of an Aatmanirbhar Bharat, at the root of which is care and compassion.

Exploiting the tragedy of people who became victims of criminal pseudo-medical experiments in Auschwitz in a debate about vaccines, the pandemic, and people who fight for saving human lives is shameful. It is disrespectful to victims and a sad symptom of moral and intellectual decline.

Yesterday evening, I received my Covid-19 vaccine. Afterward, I went to a frozen lake to dance Bhangra on it to celebrate and spread joy, hope, and positivity. I am sharing this message across Canada and beyond, wishing everyone good health and wellbeing.

An mRNA vaccine does not actually contain the virus itself. Think of it as a message sent to your immune system that shows what the virus looks like, instructions to kill it, and then, like a message that disappears, it vanishes. Amazing technology.
The bold move by the President of the United States to impose vaccine mandates will save countless lives and protect our economy. Retweet if you agree.
I can't believe that this is the same pandemic where everyone bought all the toilet paper and flour for survival, but now won't get the vaccine.
Today was a good day. I have never been happier to wait in a line. If you are eligible, join me and sign up to get your vaccine. Come with me if you want to live!
A 6-year-old came into the 5-11 vaccine clinic, tore his shirt off, sat down, looked at the registered nurse, and said, "do it." It was pretty impressive, we were all intimidated by him after that.
This is wild. Watch Ron DeSantis's full answer on Publix, Walgreen's, and CVS vaccine distribution and look at the edited cut 60 Minutes used.
24-year-old Chloe Mrozak from Illinois was arrested after allegedly using this fake COVID-19 vaccine card to enter Hawaii and avoid travel restrictions. It says "Maderna" instead of "Moderna."

I am pleased to report that a federal judge rejected the FDA's request to produce the Pfizer Covid vaccine data at a rate of 500 pages per month and instead ordered a rate of 55,000 pages per month. Everyone should read the Judge's excellent three-page decision available at [URL].

Holy moly. This study shows that after three months, the vaccine effectiveness of Pfizer and Moderna against Omicron is actually negative. Pfizer customers are 76.5 percent more likely, and Moderna customers are 39.3 percent more likely to be infected than unvaccinated people.

Nine months ago today, I collapsed at home, 14 days after receiving my first AstraZeneca vaccine. I am here when I shouldn't be. I lost my left leg from above the knee, and I have numerous other health complications, all resulting from the vaccine. Prior to this, I was a physically fit and healthy individual with no pre-existing health conditions.

It is deeply concerning that some African countries are unable to vaccinate their populations due to the United States and the European Union hoarding vaccines that their citizens do not want to use or are unable to use.

To be honest, it is unfortunate that private pharmaceutical companies have hindered the development of a universally accessible vaccine for the world. It is disheartening that their names are now casually mentioned as if it were a lighthearted meme.

The booster shot was never about reducing symptoms. The booster shot was about trying to maintain the false belief that the vaccine could prevent people from contracting and spreading COVID. That false belief was the basis for all vaccine mandates, and it completely disintegrated this month.

Today, I received my first dose of the COVID-19 vaccine. I am very grateful and fortunate to live in a region where vaccination is already available. The global distribution of vaccines is highly unequal. 1/2

I really don't think people understand just how bad this Covid Passport actually is. Look into it, it's not just checking that people got the vaccine. It is setting up a national caste system and a spying apparatus unlike anything in our history. This is it. The big one. Fight it.

Sorry, Dr. Fauci and other fearmongers. A new study shows that vaccines and naturally acquired immunity effectively neutralize COVID variants. This is good news for everyone except bureaucrats and petty tyrants. The study is titled "Neutralizing Antibodies Against SARS-CoV-2 Variants."

It is amusing to be antivax. The creation of vaccines is arguably humankind's single greatest achievement, unquestionably so in terms of the raw quantity of human misery averted. And a group of people are just against that, laughing out loud.

The Blackfeet Nation in Montana gifted their surplus COVID-19 vaccines, totaling 750 doses, to nearby residents in Alberta, Canada. People drove for hours and lined up for miles on the highway to be vaccinated at a mobile clinic set up at the border crossing.

Thanks for stopping by, Olivia, and for using your voice to urge young people to get vaccinated. If we all do our part and get the COVID-19 vaccine, we can defeat this virus once and for all. Let's do this.

On a flight now to the Bay Area and it is completely crazy that the unvaccinated are allowed to fly. It's unsafe in the cabin and we are transporting the virus. Requiring the vaccine to fly is the least we can do to stop the spread.

To every journalist who approached me in the halls of Congress and spoke about Fauci's views on natural immunity, please read the science. A Harvard epidemiologist has stated that the argument for COVID vaccine passports has been disproven.
I regret getting the vaccine. I am now having excessive enjoyment and spending an excessive amount of money.
Me and the girls, once we get the vaccine.

Trust the vaccine, trust the data, please get vaccinated and continue complying with standard operating procedures. We are now seeing worldwide how COVID-19 is swiftly changing course to be the pandemic of the unvaccinated. So let's work together to keep everyone everywhere safe.
Breaking - UPS and FedEx trucks carrying the first United States shipment of coronavirus vaccine have left Pfizer's facility near Kalamazoo, Michigan.
Vaccine passports discriminate against people and create a two-tiered society based on a personal health decision. They have failed on their own terms and have damaged society in the process.

As someone who experienced actual fascist policies in America and was sent to an internment camp solely because of my race, it is laughable to hear others cry fascism over common sense vaccine requirements. I know fascism. I suffered under fascism. This isn't fascism.

Please revise the content according to the guidelines:

"Pay everyone $1500 to get the vaccine. It is a stimulus check and a big vaccine incentive rolled into one. The result: more people get the vaccine, it saves lives, helps people financially, and the $400 billion pays for itself with the economic boost from ending the pandemic. Retweet if you agree."

Dr. Malone may be right or may be wrong in his views regarding Covid vaccines. But he is a respectable scientist, the inventor of messenger RNA vaccine technology, and so has the right to state his scientific opinion. There is no justification for suspending him. It's a disgrace.
Please stop referring to them as vaccine passports and instead call them immunization records because we have always had those and always had to show them for jobs and school.

If you are criticizing the vaccine from a media platform and have yourself been vaccinated, you are the worst kind of hypocrite – one who is indifferent to the fact that those who have the misfortune of listening to you are putting their lives and others at risk.
By far the best description I have seen of how messenger RNA (mRNA) vaccines work is that they instruct your body to create a protein and then trigger an immune response against that protein.

Today, the Food and Drug Administration (FDA) and the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) issued a statement regarding the Johnson & Johnson COVID-19 vaccine. We are recommending a pause in the use of this vaccine out of an abundance of caution.

They are correct. I do not know what is in that vaccine. I also do not know what is in Hydroxychloroquine, Robotissin, tea, anointing oil, or the blood of Jesus. I do not even know what is in people's thoughts and prayers. Additionally, I consume hot dogs.
Orlando Magic player Jonathan Isaac states that he is not receiving the COVID vaccine due to his natural immunity and data indicating that he is not at risk from COVID. Well said.

Stephen A. Smith contracted Covid, was hospitalized with severe symptoms, and nearly died. He believes that this is evidence that the vaccine he received was effective, as he only narrowly escaped death. We have reached a pinnacle of foolishness as a species.
Seattle firefighters and Seattle police officers who were terminated for not complying with the vaccine mandate are currently providing food for the homeless.

Great news! A study conducted by the Cleveland Clinic, which included 52,238 employees, has revealed that individuals who have had COVID-19 and remain unvaccinated have a re-infection rate that is comparable to those who had COVID-19 and received the vaccine.

Thanks to a generous contribution of KRW100 million made to Rotary by BTS Jimin, more children will be able to access polio vaccines. His talent is matched by his generosity and will help World Health Organization work with our partners to end polio.

The Dow is over 36,000 and unemployment has dropped from 6.3 in January to 4.8. Over 5 million jobs have been added, which is a record. 220 million vaccines have been administered in 10 months. And only 30% of the country thinks the US is on the right track. The Democratic Party has a significant messaging problem.

I had the honor of speaking with the President of the United States today about the importance of young people getting vaccinated. Check out a website to learn more about vaccines and to find a vaccination center near you. It is easy, free, and so important.

The Biden administration has confirmed that 20 million doses of the Covid-19 vaccine are missing. Several weeks ago, I mentioned that there was something suspicious about the federal vaccine supply being lower than expected. I suggested looking to Jared for answers, and I stand by that statement.

Life is pretty much back to normal here in Norway. And we have no mask mandates, no vaccine mandate, no mandated social distancing. It is amazing how much freedom you get when you just listen to and follow the science.

Wow, vaccine mandates are causing teachers who do not believe in science to quit, nurses who do not believe in medicine to quit, and cops who do not believe in public safety to quit. I am failing to see the downside to this.
Joe Rogan is not a scientist. Don't take his statements seriously. Up next, the Jonas Brothers and Big Bird remind you to get your vaccine.

I called Ted Cruz's office to make an appointment and discuss my blood pressure with the Senator. They informed me that the Senator is not qualified to provide medical advice and advised me to contact my doctor instead. Therefore, I requested them to refrain from giving advice on vaccines.

Stanley Johnson, who repeatedly broke lockdown, getting a second vaccine before many very vulnerable people have had their first, epitomizes the rank hypocrisy, cronyism, and elitism of this Tory government.

BREAKING: A Utah teacher has been fired for expressing her opinion to conservative students, stating that Trump "is a moron" and advising them to "take the vaccine" and "turn off FOX News." Retweet if you believe this teacher should be reinstated!
My friends and I after we get the vaccine.

A thread about vaccines and why vaccinated people are catching COVID. The vaccines that were developed were against the original (alpha) strain of the virus that causes COVID-19. Unfortunately, by the time we ramped up vaccination efforts, a mutated strain (delta) took over.

The vaccine is for lessening your symptoms, so you are not as sick without it and reducing how many people get hospitalized, so the hospitals do not get overcrowded and healthcare workers do not get overworked, and also lessening the chance of death. Pass it on.

BREAKING: Wisconsin Republican lawmaker Andre Jacque, who sponsored bills banning mask and vaccine mandates, is now intubated and fighting for his life on a ventilator after catching COVID just days after going maskless during a heated committee meeting. Retweet if you are vaccinated!
We need to spread the word. I am calling for a complete and immediate ban on all vaccine mandates.

Not a single word from Joe Biden about naturally acquired immunity, which the latest data shows is more durable than the vaccine, and an estimated 100 million Americans already have. There is no scientific justification for the omission. It is dishonest. They do not care.

A new variant of SARSCoV2, called C.1.2, has been identified in South Africa and several countries. There are concerns that this variant could be more infectious and evade vaccines. C.1.2 also has a mutation rate that is nearly twice as fast as the rate of the other variants.

Kevin Durant has recently tested positive for COVID. Soon, the only player eligible to play for the Nets might be Kyrie Irving, who refused to get the COVID vaccine. The media spent months portraying him as a selfish and idiotic teammate.
This clip from the Daily Show of people fighting against seat belt mandates in the 1980s is absolutely surreal from start to finish given today's climate on both masks and COVID vaccines.

If we believe in possibilities and hope, even when the unexpected happens, we will not lose our way but discover new ones. UNICEF supporters BTS on the COVID-19 pandemic, vaccines, and the collective choices we must make for a better future.

My mother had a negative reaction to Covid-19 and the vaccine. As a result, she has undergone amputation below her knees and will also be losing most of her hands in the future. We are in need of assistance with medical expenses and accommodations to ensure her comfort. We are grateful for her life. May God bless you.

BREAKING: American and Southwest Airlines announce that they will ignore Republican Governor Greg Abbott's ban on vaccine mandates and will continue to enforce them in deference to the Biden administration's orders. Retweet if you support their decision!
Absolutely brilliant work by Seth MacFarlane and the Family Guy team. If people still do not know how vaccines work after this, then I really do not know what to tell you.

A partial list of COVID misinformation repeated by the US Supreme Court so far today: •One hundred thousand children in critical care and on ventilators (Justice Sotomayor) •A vaccine mandate would prevent 100% of US cases (Justice Breyer) •COVID deaths are at an all-time high (Justice Sotomayor) 1/

More Americans have died of Covid in the last two years than died of Acquired Immunodeficiency Syndrome (AIDS) from 1981 to 2000. And we have a vaccine to stop it. History will look back on this time in utter disbelief that a nation could be this ignorant and could casually grow accustomed to such vast carnage.

I just saw an early release of a whistleblower video by Project Veritas that is about to be released, and oh my goodness, every person who was fired and not granted a religious exception for the vaccine mandate needs to see it. This is truly explosive.

The University of Connecticut is implementing fines and internet access restrictions for students who do not receive the vaccine. If you fail to comprehend the inherent malevolence associated with these vaccines, you will never grasp the truth. I will never allow it to be injected into my arm.

COVID cannot read a calendar. Nothing magical will happen on January 1st, 2021. Vaccines, masks, and avoiding crowds will slow it down and ultimately end it. Our actions will end the pandemic, not time.

NEW—Scientists at Walter Reed Army Institute of Research will soon announce that they have developed a vaccine that protects people from COVID-19 and all its variants, even Omicron, called The 'Spike Ferritin Nanoparticle COVID-19 vaccine', or SpFN. 🧵

BREAKING: A federal judge has ruled in favor of a Kentucky hospital system's COVID vaccine mandate, rejecting a legal request to end the mandate by hospital employees who oppose vaccination. These employees, who are considered anti-vaxxers, will now face termination for jeopardizing the lives of their patients and colleagues. Please retweet to express gratitude towards the judge.

The person administering my vaccine presented the small Moderna vial to me, resembling a sommelier showcasing a bottle of wine. In a moment of panic, I blurted out, "Yes, perfect, thank you," feeling foolish.

The nurses, doctors, orderlies, and every other healthcare worker who sacrificed and risked their lives do not deserve this insanity. They held the line until vaccines arrived just to be treated with contempt from people who will demand care when they get sick, which many will.
Pfizer is not Lamborghini. Sinovac is not Proton. Stop being choosy and accept whichever vaccine you get.

Vaccine mandates are causing teachers who do not believe in science to quit, nurses who do not believe in medicine to resign, and police officers who do not believe in public safety to retire. I consider this to be a positive outcome.

Here in Italy, people have started sharing this figure claiming that it is the diagram of the 5G chip inserted in the COVID vaccine. In reality, it is the electric circuit of a guitar pedal, and I believe that including it in the COVID vaccine has been an excellent idea.
Calgary: Restaurants and bars are requiring vaccine passports to sit on patios, so people are bringing their own food and having picnics on the street.

A vaccine against Alzheimer's disease could be on the horizon after scientists carried out successful trials in animals. Researchers were able to reverse memory loss in mice and are keen to move quickly to human trials.

Tonight, I will oppose both compulsory vaccines for National Health Service (NHS) staff and the introduction of vaccine passports. Both measures are counterproductive and will create division when we need cooperation and unity.
Polio and smallpox never reached herd immunity; they were eradicated by vaccines.

My 5-year-old daughter, who is immunosuppressed, did not develop antibodies to the vaccines. She is a survivor of cancer and a transplant recipient. It's disappointing, but we remain hopeful. This is why it's important to get vaccinated, wear masks, and take this pandemic seriously. We do it to protect those who are vulnerable.

The University of California has placed me on leave for challenging their vaccine mandate in court. I am a physician and the Director of the Medical Ethics Program at UC Irvine. I describe the details in this post.

We need humility, a clear vaccine strategy, and income support to contain this virus and related damage. The Government of India's mix of arrogance and suppression of the truth is killing lakhs of people.
My brother was against getting vaccinated. He died on August 31st, and his wife passed away yesterday, both from COVID. Please get vaccinated and wear a mask.

Texas schools have accumulated over 50,000 confirmed coronavirus student cases in a short period of time. Several school districts have temporarily closed due to the disease, and Texas has reported 59 child COVID-19 deaths as of September 3.

The NFL is prioritizing vaccines for some of the fittest individuals in the world, which is a positive step. However, it is important to address the systemic abuse that is prevalent among both current and former players.
Today, when India has achieved a Vaccine Century, I went to a vaccination centre at Dr. Ram Manohar Lohia Hospital. The vaccine has brought pride and protection in the lives of our citizens.

Emmanuel Macron, Justin Trudeau, and Joe Biden are all in it together. Using fear to force vaccinations and vaccine passports was always the goal. They are evil, totalitarian leaders and I am so glad Western citizens are waking up to the madness. Keep going, France!

I have no issue with any person who wants to get the vaccine. I just will never ever let that vaccine into my body. I believe firmly that Big Pharma is the greatest evil on the face of the planet. I am healthy, young, in shape, and simply unafraid of Covid-19.

They lied to you to make you line up and get a vaccine. Now they are lying to you again rather than admitting that they were wrong. Don't be mad at us unvaccinated. Be mad at yourself for being so easily fooled over and over again.

Breaking: A North Carolina police chief has been placed on two weeks of unpaid leave and six months of probation for instructing his officers to visit a "self-vaccination" clinic where they could obtain counterfeit vaccine cards. Retweet if you believe he should be terminated.

It is absolutely true that there is no FDA approved COVID-19 vaccine available in the United States today, and Pfizer has no plans to make one available any time soon. I fact checked the fact checkers, Big Pharma, and the feds and couldn't believe what I found.

Fact Check: This Moderna/NIH vaccine is the one that President Donald Trump partnered with Moderna to create on January 13, 2020. I repeat, January 13th, 2020. Just be happy. This is great news for America and for the world!

Yesterday, Archie Manners and I convinced Piers Corbyn, who is against vaccinations, to accept £10,000 that he believed was from AstraZeneca in exchange for him ceasing his criticism of their vaccine. However, the money turned out to be monopoly money, and we have a recorded video of the entire incident.

The Biden administration is now threatening Marines with their pensions, tuition assistance, and even access to the G.I. Bill if they refuse to take the COVID-19 vaccine. This is a new low and pure medical tyranny.
Please stop saying that the vaccine has no drastic side effects. I took two shots, and now I am alive with no excuse to not hang out with friends.

Breaking news: AT&T has become the largest private company in the U.S. to mandate vaccines for workers and threatens to fire all employees who defy its deadline. Retweet if you support AT&T's decision to protect the lives of its employees and customers.

Fantastic news! A potential vaccine for multiple sclerosis is now within sight on the horizon. And it's an mRNA vaccine by BioNTech, the maker of the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine. A study in mice shows great promise for improving symptoms and stopping MS progression.

Twitter should not judge Dr. Malone. If he, as the inventor of mRNA vaccine technology, is concerned, we should all be. If Big Tech and Big Pharma have another perspective, they are free to voice it. But censorship of whistleblowing experts must not stand.

Finance professionals often seem disconnected from reality and ethical considerations. I was expressing frustration about the US not lifting vaccine patents, and this individual immediately responded by saying, "We don't have any financial motivation to lift them. Human life isn't a motivating factor." It's disheartening to encounter such a perspective.
BREAKING: United Airlines announces it will be firing 600 workers for refusing to obey its vaccine mandate unless they relent and get the shot. Retweet if you support United keeping our skies safe!
Social movements flooded São Paulo's Paulista Avenue demanding vaccines, food, and the immediate impeachment of Brazil's Jair Bolsonaro.

BREAKING: BBC presenter Lisa Shaw died due to complications from the AstraZeneca Covid vaccine, a coroner has found. The healthy mother of one developed headaches a week after her first dose of the vaccine and suffered blood clots in the brain which ultimately led to her death.

EPIC—I want to discuss the issue of not getting vaccinated and then seeking medical help at the hospital when you contract the virus. If you don't have enough trust in doctors to follow their advice and get vaccinated, why do you suddenly trust them once you catch COVID?
Hoard vaccine, manufacture vaccine inequity, create conditions for emergence of variants, then ban and isolate.

Governors were repeatedly told by the Department of Health and Human Services that there was a strategic reserve of vaccines. This week, the American people were informed that the reserve would be released to increase the supply of vaccines. It now appears that no reserve actually exists. The Trump administration must provide an immediate explanation for this deception.

Let me clarify: 1) Seventy-five percent of Americans are now vaccinated. 2) COVID cases have increased by 300% compared to this time last year, when there was no vaccine. This seems to be a combination of liberal science and math. I suppose I'm just not intelligent enough to understand it.
TN is seriously broken. Fifty swabs in my ER. Forty-seven are positive. Not one person is vaccinated! And yet they still have no intentions of getting the vaccine. I give up. There's no fixing them.

Joe Biden's presidency so far has been marked by several challenges: a gas crisis, a border crisis, closed schools, rising inflation, Israel under attack, increased crime in major cities, and taking credit for President Trump's vaccine efforts. Additionally, it is expected that he will raise taxes.

Last night, I ran into a man who lives in Israel, where they have vaccinated almost the whole eligible population. I asked if they have "vaccine passports" and he pulled his up on his smartphone. Then he said, "I don't understand why Americans politicize everything." Me neither, Eli.

I have practiced at the Intensive Care Unit bedside in Washington, Arizona, and Ohio since March 2020, going with teams of skilled providers to areas of need. Each time, we see the same story play out: lungs on the right decreasing that could be saved by two doses of a vaccine.

BREAKING: America's Frontline Doctors has filed a lawsuit in federal court seeking a temporary restraining order against the use of the COVID-19 vaccine in children. AFLDS will protect our civil liberties and our uncompromising right to bodily integrity.
